title: New Stuff Script
content:
Anyone recognizes this? Thanks. Adriano

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205093337im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_4611.jpg)

 [‹ Old Time looking font, trying to identify](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205093337/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42090 "Go to previous forum topic") [futura or avant garde? not quite ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205093337/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42106 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adriano

comments.content:
Adriano, this one has me stumped. I checked Ale Paul’s scripts, and Jason Walcott’s (both at Veer), because I thought this might fit their work, but I found nothing that matched. This ’S’ seems familiar, but I have dropped so far behind in the new Script font releases that I can’t recall where I saw it.

Have you seen it used anywhere else?

I hope someone recognizes it, or I stumble across it somewhere. (It wasn’t in the Script Font ID Guide places I would have put it, if I had collected it already.)

- Mike Yanega

Could this be custom drawn? The two f seem not exactly identical.  
Where is this from?
